attributes.review: i tried to order my regular mcdonald’s meal ( a 20 pc. nugget with 10 lg. fries,2 lg. root beers,and 4 oreo mcflurrys + a bonus m&m mcflurry ) and then it told me that i was gonna be fat one day and didn’t let me order so i had to stick with the angry meal for kids😭😡
attributes.title: this app hurt my feelings

attributes.review: So I thought this was a texting app?? I didn’t realize it was an advertisement for fruit🍊🤷‍♂️ I don’t appreciate the misleading title.

attributes.review: okay as a proud trumpster 🇹🇼🇹🇼🇹🇼 i expected to see uncensored pics of trumpy boy💅🏽but all it is random and boring scripture 🙄🙄 i expected more from you guys!! i am let down and no longer a trump stan. no more edits for you😡 lol i’m voting for biden now !😹😽
